def_en: In a court of law, the jury is the group of people who have been chosen from the general public to listen to the facts about a crime and to decide whether the person accused is guilty or not.

def_cn: （竞赛的）评判委员会，裁判委员会
def_en: A jury is a group of people who choose the winner of a competition.

def_cn: （某事）悬而未决，仍未达成定论
def_en: If you say that the jury is out or that the jury is still out on a particular subject, you mean that people in general have still not made a decision or formed an opinion about that subject.
